mapper.update:
update PHIP_STANDARD_VER_RS_SET
FK_VERSION_ID = #{fkVersionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_CDA_ID = #{fkCdaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_SET_ID = #{fkSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_AT=sysdate
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT I.* FROM PHIP_ST_SET_INFO I, PHIP_STANDARD_VER_RS_SET S, PHIP_ST_RS_CDA_SET_INFO O WHERE S.FK_CDA_ID = O.FK_CDA_ID AND I.ID = S.FK_SET_ID AND S.FK_SET_ID = O.FK_SET_ID AND S.FK_VERSION_ID = #{fkVersionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND S.FK_CDA_ID = #{fkCdaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
